name: 陳怡倩
objective: 本課程旨在幫助學生熟稔運用基本重要文法以寫出正確自然, 表達清晰之句子.  內容包括語法結構和錯誤分析, 例如不完整句、誤置修飾語、不連結修飾語、散漫句、錯誤平行結構、易混淆字、贅詞等常見問題。
schedule:
W1 Course Introduction,  Adjective Clauses
W2 Noun Clauses
W3 Participial Phrases 
W4 Gerund Phrases, Infinitive Phrases
W5 Absolute Constructions
W6 Abstract Noun Phrases
W7 Appositive Phrases
W8 Mid-term
W9 Sentence Combination
W10 Writing Process & Paragraph Structure
W11 Narrating 
W12 Narrating (cont.)
W13 Describing
W14 Describing (cont.)
W15 Explaining
W16 Explaining (cont.)
W17Comparing/Contrasting
W18 Comparing/Contrasting (cont.) & Final
scorePolicy: Class activities & pop quizzes (20%); assignments (35%); mid-term (30%); final (15%).
materials:
1. Donald, Robert B., Moore, James D., Morrow, Betty Richmond, Wargetz, Lillian Griffith, & Werner, Kathleen. (1998). Writing Clear Paragraphs (6th ed.). Upper Saddle River, NJ: Prentice Hall.
2. Hacker, Diana. (2007). A Writer’s Reference with help for Writing in the Disciplines (6th ed.). Boston, MA: Bedford/St. Martin's.
